name: gcs-connector
description: Google Cloud Storage integration with buckets, objects, and signed URLs
author: Hermetic Labs

media.caption: Google Cloud Storage Connector hero image

card.title: Google Cloud Storage
card.description: GCS integration with buckets, signed URLs, and IAM

summary.overview: Complete Google Cloud Storage integration supporting bucket operations, object management, signed URL generation, and lifecycle policies with native IAM integration.
summary.exampleUseCase: Upload analytics exports to GCS, generate signed URLs for time-limited dashboard access, and configure lifecycle rules to auto-archive old data.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Direct GCP connectivity using service account credentials. Works alongside S3 and Azure Blob in EVE's unified storage layer. IAM-aware for enterprise deployments.
